description: In a world where most people work for material success, Ajay Bhootra works to satiate his passion — being a successful salesman. Bhootra is an optometrist and the author of medical books like Optician’s Guide, Dispensing Optics, Clinical Refraction Guide, etc., and a fiction, Yet We Marry. He lives in Kolkata with his family.
name: Ajay Bhootra
